api_list.name: Generate RSS Feed
api_list.description: Generate RSS for given Twitter ID. (*NOTE: PubDates will be calculated approximately)
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://e1yr-twitfeed-v1.p.rapidapi.com/feed.api?id=google"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "e1yr-twitfeed-v1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://e1yr-twitfeed-v1.p.rapidapi.com/feed.api?id={id}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "e1yr-twitfeed-v1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
